cd1f7ea6-8ab1-43f4-8ba3-597e2cafc588.description: Earners of the HCIE-Routing & Switching badge have the knowledge and skills required to construct, manage complex large and medium-sized enterprise networks. Individuals have demonstrated the ability to design enterprise networks independently, implement those designs using Huawei routing and switching devices and troubleshoot complex network faults.
cd1f7ea6-8ab1-43f4-8ba3-597e2cafc588.name: Huawei Certified ICT Expert - Routing & Switching (HCIE-Routing & Switching)

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 1.5hour, written qualification exam in Pearson VUE Test Center, which validates an engineer's ability to improve product-related skills and have a good understanding of the network protocols

Pass the eight-hour lab exam in Huawei HCIE Test Center, which requires the engineer to design network architecture, troubleshoot a series of complex networks, analyze the application requirements of enterprise networks in a timed test situation

cfe33a21-4814-44a7-b115-6dfa5fee3ecd.description: Earners of the HCIE-Cloud badge have the knowledge and skills required to plan and design an ICT Cloud computing solution. Individuals have a comprehensive understanding of cloud computing technology, complex applications, solution deployment, maintenance, and optimization. HCIE-Cloud certified engineers are now able to build enterprise cloud computing solutions that meet the needs of mainstream applications.
cfe33a21-4814-44a7-b115-6dfa5fee3ecd.name: Huawei Certified ICT Expert - Cloud Computing (HCIE-Cloud Computing)

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 1.5 hour, written qualification exam in Pearson VUE Test Center, which validates an engineer's ability to improve product-related skills and have a good understanding of Cloud Computing related technologies

Pass the eight-hour lab exam in Huawei HCIE Test Center, which requires the engineer to analyze the application requirement, implement Cloud Computing environments and deploy high available cloud services in a timed test situation

2ab88e3c-5458-41cf-b974-ce025be5a44c.description: Earners of the HCIE-Storage badge have the knowledge and skills required to construct, optimize, and manage complex storage systems and storage solutions. Individuals have a comprehensive understanding of Huawei's storage technology and have the ability to resolve complex technical problems. HCIE-Storage certified engineers are now able to design Huawei storage solutions, and configure Huawei storage products to meet application requirements in multiple scenarios.
2ab88e3c-5458-41cf-b974-ce025be5a44c.name: Huawei Certified ICT Expert - Storage (HCIE-Storage)

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 1.5 hour, written qualification exam in Pearson VUE Test Center, which validates a candidate's mastery of protocols and theoretical knowledge necessary to construct, optimize, and manage the storage system and storage solutions

Pass the eight-hour lab exam in Huawei HCIE Test Center, which requires the engineer to design, implement and troubleshoot Huawei storage solutions to meet various application requirements in multiple scenarios

d3cd73aa-7243-4361-8cb1-dd729cf16c59.description: Earners of the HCIE-Datacom badge have the knowledge and skills required to be able to use Huawei Datacom products and solutions to plan, deploy, maintain, and optimize enterprise campus networks, WAN interconnection, and bearer WAN. You will be competent for the expert positions of full-scenario enterprise networks (including account managers, project managers, pre-sales experts, post-sales experts, network architects, etc.).
d3cd73aa-7243-4361-8cb1-dd729cf16c59.name: Huawei Certified ICT Expert - Datacom (HCIE-Datacom)

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 1.5 hours, written qualification exam in Pearson VUE Test Center, which validates an engineer's ability to grasp Datacom -related skills and have a good understanding of Routing and switching advanced technologies, panoramic view of enterprise network architecture, typical architecture and technologies of campus network, planning and deployment of Huawei CloudCampus solution, typical architecture and technologies of WAN interconnection, planning and deployment of Huawei SD-WAN solution.

Pass the eight-hour lab exam in Huawei HCIE Test Center, which requires the engineer to understand Routing and switching advanced technologies, panoramic view of enterprise network architecture, typical architecture and technologies of campus network, planning and deployment of Huawei CloudCampus solution, typical architecture and technologies of WAN interconnection, planning and deployment of Huawei SD-WAN solution, typical architecture and technologies of bearer WAN.

skills.name: panoramic view of enterprise network architecture
planning and deployment of Huawei CloudCampus solution
planning and deployment of Huawei CloudWAN solution
planning and deployment of Huawei SD-WAN solution
typical architecture and technologies of bearer WAN
typical architecture and technologies of campus network
typical architecture and technologies of WAN interconnection

6eb832dd-360b-40b1-a240-3697785a9fa0.description: Earners of the HCIE-Security badge have the knowledge and skills required to design, deploy, manage and optimize network security solutions. Individuals have a comprehensive understanding of network security technology and can address increasingly diversified cyber security challenges. HCIE-Security certified engineers are now able to use the Huawei Security products to construct a network security solution. The English Version of the HCIE-Security certification is coming soon.
6eb832dd-360b-40b1-a240-3697785a9fa0.name: Huawei Certified ICT Expert - Security (HCIE-Security)

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 1.5 hour, written qualification exam in Pearson VUE Test Center, which validates an engineer's ability to improve product-related skills and have good understanding of network security

Pass the eight-hour lab exam in Huawei HCIE Test Center, which requires the engineer to improve network security, troubleshoot complex network security faults, resolve security problems in a timed test situation

7b2bcb60-3f46-473e-9d5c-b47b6804158e.description: Earners of the HCIE-DC badge have the knowledge and skills required to operate and maintain the company's data center products, technologies, and solutions. Individuals have demonstrated the ability to design large and medium-sized data center independently, implement those designs with Huawei Data Center products and have proficient skill in operation and maintenance.
7b2bcb60-3f46-473e-9d5c-b47b6804158e.name: Huawei Certified ICT Expert - Data Center (HCIE-DC)

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 1.5 hour, written qualification exam in Pearson VUE Test Center, which validates an engineer's ability to improve product-related skills and have a good understanding of Data Center related technologies

Pass the eight-hour lab exam in Huawei HCIE Test Center, which requires the engineer to analyze the application requirement, implement Data Center underlay network and deploy high available cloud services in a timed test situation

dee50105-a6a3-4a88-aa89-9a25a3eadc69.description: Earners of the HCIE-Cloud Service Solutions Architect badge have the knowledge and skills required to design and deploy scalable service architectures on HUAWEI CLOUD. Individuals have a comprehensive understanding of architecture design, service selection, application reconstruction, multi-dimensional O&M, security hardening, and cloud migration. HCIE-Cloud Service Solutions Architect certified engineers are now qualified for the cloud system architects and cloud migration expert positions.
dee50105-a6a3-4a88-aa89-9a25a3eadc69.name: Huawei Certified ICT Expert - Cloud Service Solutions Architect (HCIE-Cloud Service Solutions Architect)

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 1.5 hour, written qualification exam in Pearson VUE Test Center, which validates an engineer's ability to grasp product-related skills and have a good understanding of Cloud Service Solutions Architect related technologies.

Pass the eight-hour lab exam in Huawei HCIE Test Center, which requires the engineer to  understand  HUAWEI CLOUD resource layer service architecture design, konw how to use tools for HUAWEI CLOUD basic O&M and multi-dimensional O&M，and konw how to use migration tools provided by HUAWEI CLOUD.

e18dcd16-8e34-4ea5-ba98-f22ff38c8188.description: Earners of the HCIE-Big Data-Data Mining badge have the knowledge and skills required to analyze and mine big data. Individuals have a comprehensive understanding of mainstream technology of big data mining and complex data mining methods. HCIE-Big Data-Data Mining certified experts are now able to perform end-to-end modeling of big data through Huawei MRS or open source technology platforms and are competent for the data mining positions and more.
e18dcd16-8e34-4ea5-ba98-f22ff38c8188.name: Huawei Certified ICT Expert - Big Data - Data Mining(HCIE-Big Data-Data Mining)

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the two-hour, written qualification exam in Pearson VUE Test Center, which validates an engineer's ability to grasp product-related skills and have a good understanding of Big Data related technologies
Pass the eight-hour lab exam in Huawei HCIE Test Center, which requires the engineer to dig out valuable information from given data, and give reasonable advice based on the information being found

3885b37e-b122-4e98-81a3-c0875af154dc.description: Earners of the HCIE-Transmission badge have the knowledge and skills required to optimize, reconstruct, and manage a complex transmission network. Individuals have a comprehensive understanding of transmission network technology, transmission network design, and troubleshooting. HCIE-Transmission certified engineers are now able to design reliable transport networks that can efficiently integrate with business needs. The English Version of the HCIE-Transmission certification is coming soon.
3885b37e-b122-4e98-81a3-c0875af154dc.name: Huawei Certified ICT Expert - Transmission (HCIE-Transmission)

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 1.5 hour, written qualification exam in Pearson VUE Test Center, which validates an engineer's ability to improve product-related skills and apply the related technologies to solve the practical transmission network problems

Pass the eight-hour lab exam in Huawei HCIE Test Center, which requires the engineer to design network architecture, troubleshoot a series of complex networks, Solve the problems in the network in a timely manner

37238892-9715-4651-8bef-df2d6f41ec3c.description: Earners of the HCIE-EC badge have the knowledge and skills required to plan, deploy, operate and maintain an enterprise communication system by applying their insight to Huawei relevant products and solutions in the direction of enterprise communication. HCIE-EC certified engineers are able to independently build, configure, and maintain the system to ensure smooth operation of the enterprise communication platform.
37238892-9715-4651-8bef-df2d6f41ec3c.name: Huawei Certified ICT Expert - Enterprise Communication (HCIE-EC)

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 1.5 hour, written qualification exam in Pearson VUE Test Center, which validates an engineer's ability to design enterprise communication network by applying their in-depth understanding of product-related principles and protocols
Pass the eight-hour lab exam in Huawei HCIE Test Center, which requires the engineer to deploy enterprise communication networks and implement specified services

052e7d11-bcc7-41b8-a00e-d31770205db6.description: Earners of the HCIE-Intelligent Computing badge have the knowledge and skills required to construct, optimize and manage intelligent computing system and solutions. Individuals have the ability to resolve complex technical problems of Huawei Intelligent Computing solutions. HCIE-Intelligent Computing certified engineers are now able to design and configure Huawei TaiShan and Atlas series products and intelligent servers to meet application requirements in multiple scenarios.
052e7d11-bcc7-41b8-a00e-d31770205db6.name: Huawei Certified ICT Expert - Intelligent Computing (HCIE-Intelligent Computing)

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 1.5 hour, written qualification exam in Pearson VUE Test Center, which validates a candidate's mastery of theoretical knowledge necessary to construct, optimize, and manage the intelligent computing system and solutions.

Pass the eight-hour lab exam in Huawei HCIE Test Center, which requires the engineer to design, implement and troubleshoot Huawei intelligent computing solutions to meet various application requirements in multiple scenarios.

39c184d1-8dea-4015-b83a-16cd1ded5181.description: Earners of the HCIE-WLAN badge have the knowledge and skills required to Solid WLAN theory, WLAN solution planning and design capabilities, large-scale WLAN network deployment, and network O&M optimization capabilities. Individuals have a comprehensive understanding of WLAN technical principles, WLAN IoT convergence, CloudCampus solution and deployment, and troubleshooting. HCIE-WLAN certified engineers are now able to plan, deploy and operate medium and large complex WLANs.
39c184d1-8dea-4015-b83a-16cd1ded5181.name: Huawei Certified ICT Expert - WLAN (HCIE-WLAN)

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 1.5 hours, written qualification exam in Pearson VUE Test Center, which validates an engineer's ability to grasp WLAN related technologies and principles and WLAN network planning, construction and optimization capabilities.

Pass the eight-hour lab exam in Huawei HCIE Test Center, which requires the engineer to  understand Huawei WLAN network planning, construction, maintenance, and optimization capabilities provide solutions with high security, availability, and reliability based on application requirements.

08d9b2bb-7541-44a0-8adc-ad264322b1b4.description: Earners of the HCIE-Data Center Facility Design badge have the knowledge and skills required to design data center facility. Individuals have a comprehensive understanding of data center planning consulting business process, evaluation model tools, site selection report , feasibility study report, power supply system planning and design, Cooling system planning and design, DCIM system planning and design.
08d9b2bb-7541-44a0-8adc-ad264322b1b4.name: Huawei Certified ICT Expert - Data Center Facility Design (HCIE-Data Center Facility Design)

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the one-and-a-half  hour written qualification exam in Pearson VUE test center, which validates an engineer's ability to grasp Data center facility design-related skills and have a good understanding of how to plan and design data center facility system.

Pass the three-hour lab exam in Huawei HCIE test center, which requires the engineer to  understand data center facility design, know how to use tools for power supply system, cooling system and DCIM system design.

skills.name: Data Center Planning Consulting Business Process
Power Supply System Planning And Design

d5ef27a2-113b-4c8b-9c8a-b85c82fc612a.description: Earners of the HCIE-GaussDB-OLTP badge have the knowledge and skills required to design GaussDB deployment solutions, design HA solutions, optimize database performance, and handle complex problems. Individuals have a comprehensive understanding of database architecture principles, GaussDB deployment modes, advanced GaussDB features and key technologies, disaster recovery and backup and restoration principles, database optimization, and fault and emergency handling. HCIE-GaussDB-OLTP certified
d5ef27a2-113b-4c8b-9c8a-b85c82fc612a.name: Huawei Certified ICT Expert - GaussDB (HCIE-GaussDB-OLTP)

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 1.5 hours written qualification exam in Pearson VUE Test Center, which validates an engineer's ability to grasp database principles and architecture and have a good understanding of GaussDB products, HA solution, backup and recovery, troubleshooting and emergency maintenance, database performance optimization.

Pass the 8 hours lab exam in Huawei HCIE Test Center, which requires the engineer to understand database performance optimization, database object management, SQL syntax, database connection, user roles and permissions management, dynamic anonymization, security audit, row-level access policies, stored procedures and cursors, functions and triggers, transaction management.

skills.name: advanced GaussDB features and key technologies, disaster recovery and backup and restoration principles
database optimization, and fault and emergency handling

3a69906c-9d53-4512-8907-eff99e64ace7.description: Earners of the HCIE-Collaboration badge have the knowledge and skills required to audio and video technologies, H.323 and SIP protocols, high reliability solution, public-private network traversal solution, convergence solution, system networking planning and design, system O&M, and troubleshooting in the collaboration field.
3a69906c-9d53-4512-8907-eff99e64ace7.name: Huawei Certified ICT Expert - Collaboration (HCIE-Collaboration)

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 1.5hours, written qualification exam in Pearson VUE Test Center, which validates an engineer's ability to grasp Data center facility design-related skills and have a good understanding of how to planning, design and deploy videoconferencing systems.
Pass the eight-hour lab exam in Huawei HCIE Test Center, which requires the engineer to understand network planning, design, O&M, and troubleshooting of Huawei video conferencing systems.

skills.name: O&M of large-scale integrated videoconferencing systems

f3e4b9ae-2d02-4705-82c4-afe15a76fe6d.description: Earners of the HCIE-Data Center Network badge have the knowledge and skills required to use Huawei data center network products and solutions to plan, construct, maintain, and optimize data center networks, are qualified for the data center network scenario expert position. (including account managers, project managers, pre-sales experts, post-sales experts, network architects, etc.)
f3e4b9ae-2d02-4705-82c4-afe15a76fe6d.name: Huawei Certified ICT Expert - Data Center Network (HCIE-Data Center Network)

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 1.5hours, written qualification exam in Pearson VUE Test Center, which validates an engineer's ability to grasp Data Center Network design-related skills and have a good understanding of basic knowledge of data center network, advanced technologies and applications of data center networks, Huawei Cloud Fabric solution, data center network planning and design, and data center network O&M.

Pass the eight-hour lab exam in Huawei HCIE Test Center, which requires the engineer to understand planning and design data center network, and have skills in deploying and optimizing related technologies.

d0a5ccf4-f4e3-4761-bb83-940c5a1db212.description: Earners of the HCIE-Intelligent Vision badge have the knowledge and skills required to master software-defined cameras, micro-edge devices, storage platforms, HoloSens cloud services, solution architectures and features.
d0a5ccf4-f4e3-4761-bb83-940c5a1db212.name: Huawei Certified ICT Expert - Intelligent Vision (HCIE-Intelligent Vision)

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 1.5hours, written qualification exam in Pearson VUE Test Center, which validates an engineer's ability to grasp Data center facility design-related skills and have a good understanding of how to design and deploy intelligent vision devices.
Pass the eight-hour lab exam in Huawei HCIE Test Center, which requires the engineer to understand design, deploy, optimize, and troubleshoot intelligent vision devices.
